<Link id="l00022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="22"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// searched at runtime without the need for additional storage. The enum values</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="23"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// are currently emitted in X86GenInstrInfo.inc in alphabetical order. Which</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// makes sorting these tables a simple matter of alphabetizing the table.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="222"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// NOTE: This swaps the KeyOp and DstOp in the table so we can sort it.</span></CodeLine>
